verses.verse: And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> after their <S%H4550>journeys,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7508>Rephidim:<s%> and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

Why the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H7378>chide<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H4325>water<s%> that we may <S%H8354>drink.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H7378>chide<s%> you with me? <S%H4100>why<s%> do you <S%H5254>tempt<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for <S%H4325>water;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us and our <S%H1121>children<s%> and our <S%H4735>cattle<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> they be <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H5750>ready<s%> to <S%H5619>stone<s%> me.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5674>Go<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> with you of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H1980>go.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H6697>rock<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb;<s%> and you shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and there shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of it, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8354>drink.<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4532>Massah,<s%> and <S%H4809>Meribah,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H7379>chiding<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> they <S%H5254>tempted<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us, or not?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H977>Choose<s%> us out <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> out, <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> I will <S%H5324>stand<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to him, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H1389>hill.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7311>held<s%> up his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed:<s%> and <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H5117>let<s%> <S%H5117>down<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed.<s%>

But Moses <S%H4872><s%><S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H3515>heavy;<s%> and they <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> him, and he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> <S%H8551>stayed<s%> up his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> the <S%H2088>one<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> side, and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> side; and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H530>steady<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H935>going<s%> <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2522>discomfited<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H5310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and <S%H7760>rehearse<s%> it in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua:<s%> for I will utterly <S%H4229>put<s%> out the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it <S%H3071>Jehovahnissi:<s%>

For he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3027>sworn<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will have <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
